name: Lutum47™ CLP
description:
Lutum47™ CLP (Manicouagan Glacial Water)


Harness the purity and nutrient-rich composition of Lutum47™

CLP, delivering a superior hydration solution enriched with essential minerals

and nutrients. Originating from the pristine, untouched regions of the

Manicouagan, this glacial water is distinguished by its unique blend of

minerals, including calcium, iron, potassium, magnesium, sodium, and silicon. Additionally,

this pure glacial water contains chlorophyll and carotenoids, enhancing its

nourishing properties for the skin.


Appearance : liquid

Odor : very faint fruity odor


Color : Slightly cloudy, colorless to light golden

pH: 7,5 - 9,0

Shelf life: 36 months


Formulation Guidelines:

 

-         5% - 10%: To help to protect the skin

-         10% - 15%: To rebalance the skin pH

-         35% - 50%: To soothe the skin

-         75% - 100% : To hydrate, regulate sebum, and strengthen hair


Cosmetic properties: toner, moisturizer, softener, hair texturizer

Storage and transport conditions: 4°C – 30°C à R.H. 30% - 65%
company_name: AEM Lab Inc. / Manicouagan Sea Minerals
